grading_explanation.grammar_and_clarity: 1.5/3.0 – Some errors in grammar and clarity make it somewhat difficult to follow.
grading_explanation.structure: 1.0/1.5 – Generally logical flow, but lacks clear organization or is difficult to follow.
grading_explanation.info_coverage: 1.0/3.5 – Mentions academic details, but no practical experience, technical skills, or career direction are discussed.
grading_explanation.relevance_to_role: 1.0/2.0 – Minimal indication of practical skills or professional preparation.

feedback: Specifically mention your full name, academic background, practical experience, technical skills, and career goals.
Improve the structure of your introduction by organizing your thoughts logically and clearly.
Connect your academic experience with relevant examples of practical work or projects.

grading_debug.notes: Focus on demonstrating practical readiness and technical skills to increase chances of success in interviews.
